I wish I could have kept it but doesn't fit for bigger breast.

I liked the fit because the material is very stretchy. It's a single layer material, but thick enough to give decent coverage. Dress length is "office appropriate" (I'm 5'5''). I would buy again. Only down side: I have to wash this in delicate and keep it in a garment bag so it doesn't get caught on other things.

I purchased this dress for Halloween and it worked great for that purpose. The dress was on the thicker side. My only complaint would be the cape easily moved around in the wind. That would be cool if there was a way to secure the cape to the dress.

This dress is well made. My daughter loves this dress. The fabric is light but feels soft on the skin. It has a zipper and shawl. Dress washes up well and comes out of the dryer wrinkle free. It is true to size. For the price, it is a bargain!
I loved this dress fit great and got so many compliments on it

fits well and is a thicker fabric which is great since i need this for the winter but my absolute favorite thing is its one of the few dresses ive found that completely covers my port surgery scar. if any other cancer survivors are looking for a dress THIS is the one I'd recommend

I used this for a Fleur Delacour costume for Halloween. I felt beautiful and it fit well. I can also use this for a dress in my every day minus the shawl and I'm very pleased with this purchase. It has some stretch and is very comfortable to wear.

Absolutely loved this dress. The fit was perfect and the material is soft and flowy. I don’t think I’ve ever got so many compliments on a costume before! For reference, I’m 5’5 and 135 pounds and the large was a perfect fit. Fit more like a medium to me. Big recommend!

Material, very nice. Cape, super cute. Adjustable straps, absolutely. Cost, affordable and not cheaply made.  But the absolute, best selling point of these pretty dresses....is that it has POCKETS. As a real woman, you know the struggle of not having pockets or tiny ones in pretty much anything we wear, and it's AWFUL. This dress is part of the "We know what real women want" club. And that ladies...is pockets. 10/10 would recommend. It fits great, looks great and its functional. It's gonna be a very perfect teen Goth picture day for my dark little princess.
This dress fit my daughter perfect. We originally bought it to use as her Halloween costume but we will continue to use it for going out to a nice dinner

I ordered a medium but got a small and was freaking out but the small fits perfect! I got this to wear for a costume party but it can easily be slipped into a great date dress. Thicker material, gives me a great waist line. Exceeded my expectations!
I purchased this dress for my daughter. It was true to size and a beautiful blue. It was a plus that it had pockets.  What girl don't love pockets.

The dress itself feels sturdy and is not see through, which is a plus! I am about 195 lbs and 5’5 and a half and have a large chest, and the 2 XL is a bit snug in that area, but it fits. The shawl is cute, but the button that holds it together isn’t great (I am sure I will end up ripping it and it is a bit difficult to fasten.) I would definitely purchase again and I wish it was available in purple, red, and green. Fingers crossed that they release more colors!

I was really not expecting much considering the price. I was shocked when I opened the package to discover such a delightful dress! It's comfortable, flattering, and well made. The removable shawl makes this purchase so versatile! Perfect by itself in the warm months. Add a cardigan and leggings for the winter time. I just love it.
Beautiful dress! Very high quality for such a good price. And it’s comfortable and cute. We are gonna order the black dress to add to our collection.
Bought this for my daughter for her musical. Great quality, good fit, color as seen. True to size.

Didn't feel cheap or fragile at all. Survived the washing machine and dryer. Thick comfortable fabric. Also pretty stretchy. One of my favorite simple dresses and I was only intending on using it for Halloween.

Purchased this for a Harry Potter/Star Wars wedding vowel renewal party. Got so many compliments and it was comfortable enough to wear all night! Aced the shoes and the hat separately, but they were easy enough to match with the dress. The sheer slipped quite a bit, and I had to readjust it when I was on the dance floor, but other than that, I have no complaints!
